name: CLAN WARS VR
description:
Game Name:CLAN WARS VR

Game Type: Online Versus VR Competitive Shooting Game

CLAN WARS VR is an online battle VR competitive shooting game with the background of the battle for the deer in the Classic of Mountains and Seas. Through the perfect fusion of traditional historical culture and modern technology, the game creates a unique and fascinating virtual world, allowing players to experience the tense atmosphere of ancient wars and the realism of the battlefield.

Gameplay: 1 vs 1 offline experience

Red War Desolate City VR adopts a 1-on-1 offline experience method, allowing players to conduct real-time competitive battles with opponents. The time limit for each battle is 5 minutes, and players need to defeat their opponents within a limited time to win.

In the game, the player will play a brave general, armed with a bow and arrow, to help the king conquer all directions. During the exciting battle, players need to use superb archery skills and tactical wisdom to repel the enemy and protect their king.

.
